short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Upgrade your Google search experience with ChatGPT. Get AI-generated insights alongside search results.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Chrome extension for Google Search is fastest way to look at results both from google search and chatGPT on the same page. You can choose to display chatGPT result always or display chatGPT results only when you append your query with a question mark. 

With this extension, you have the flexibility to decide when you’d like to see ChatGPT results in your Google search. Here’s a quick reminder of the features you now have access to:

Choose when ChatGPT results are displayed: You have the option to view ChatGPT results only when you need them, keeping your search experience clutter-free.
Use the “?” shortcut: Simply append a “?” to your search query in Google, and the ChatGPT results will be displayed alongside your regular search results.
Opt for ChatGPT results with every query: If you prefer, you can enable ChatGPT results to appear with every search query, providing you with more comprehensive information at your fingertips.
